item.title: UGC Video Series Project for Protein Powder (Male Creator Needed) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for 5 male creators to make 5 videos each about our protein powder. We are looking for:

- a man in his 30-40s who knows a lot about finance/works in finance
-skilled grill master or cook, aged 35-50
-a man 35+ who is a handy man/skilled in DIYing (home improvement, car mechanics, etc.)
- a man 40+ who can emulate a C-Suite executive at a company
- a knowledgeable and skilled golfer in his 30s or 40s

Each of the 5 videos will be short, testimonial/skit videos talking about our protein powder from your point of view.


Posted On: June 19, 2024 17:00 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, Humor, How To, Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography
Skills: MP4, Humor, How To, Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
